Manx: Moirrey: “Cheau mee yn clane laa jiu cooney lesh Jonee dy chionnaghey edd noa.”
English: Mary: “I spent the whole day to-day helping Judith to buy a new hat.”

Manx: Moirrey: “O, va shoh ynrican yn chied laa. Cha nel ee rieau kiarit ayns e haigney derrey lurg yn trass laa.”
English: Mary: “Oh. this was only the first day. She never makes up her mind until after the third day.”
